attributes.action: Get Inhalers free on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its not fair that we have to pay for something that is saving our lives everyday, yet other people get medication that saves there life for free, How do you choose who gets to live for free?

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a statement. 

Please re-word your petition title and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
